original: Johansson, Alfred Gideon, jord|brukskonsulent, Linköping, f. 12/1/89 i Brunnhem, Skarab. 1., av Alfred J. o. Charlotta Johansson. G. 25 m. Ester Janson. Barn: Lena f. 26, Lennart 28, Eskil 30, Eva 35. — Lantm:-sk. i Stenstorp 13, folkhögsk. Hvilans övre avd. 15, agronomex. v. Ultuna lantbr :inst. 17. Tf. lär. v. Varpnäs !lantbr:sk. 18, dito v. Hamra lantm:-sk. 19, e. förrättn:man h. odlingsrådet i östergötl. 20-21, bitr. jordbr :konsul. i Upps. 1. 22-23, konsul, f. täckdikn:-verksamh. h. östergötl. 1. hush :säll’sk. sed. 24, ledare f. hush:sällsk. täck-dikn :verksamh. sed. 39, av Kgl. Maj :t behörigförklarad att handlägga syne-förrättn. £. dikn. enl. vattenlagen 46. Uppdr.: fäkmätn. å Bjärka-Säby samt arkivforskn. o. ritn. f. Bjärka-Säby godsbeskrivn. 18-21, att f. jordbr :dep. egnah:avd. upprätta planer f. upplåtelser av jordbr :kolonat 22, att utarb. graf. framställn. f. lantbr :styr. ut-ställn. å lantbr rmötet i Gbg 23. V. ordf. i östergötl.-distr. av JUF 30-39, led. av torrläggn :ndn i Östergötl. 1. sed. 45.
translated: Johansson, Alfred Gideon, agricultural consultant, Linköping, b. 12/1/89 in Brunnhem, Skaraborg County, son of Alfred J. and Charlotta Johansson. Married to Ester Janson in 1925. Children: Lena b. 1926, Lennart b. 1928, Eskil b. 1930, Eva b. 1935. Education and professional experience: Agricultural school in Stenstorp in 1913, folk high school in Hvilan 1915, agricultural exam in Ultuna agricultural institute in 1917. Substitute teacher at Varpnäs agricultural school in 1918, substitute teacher at Hamra agricultural school in 1919, former official and agricultural adviser in Östergötland County from 1920-1921, assistant agricultural consultant in Uppsala County from 1922-1923, consultant for drainage operations in Östergötland County and household society since 1924, leader of household society's drainage operations since 1939, authorized by the Royal Majesty to conduct inspection proceedings for water laws in 1946. Assignments: Surveying at Bjärka-Säby and research and drawings for the description of the Bjärka-Säby estate from 1918-1921, plans for leases of agricultural colonies in the Department of Agriculture's division of appropriated lands in 1922, graphical representation for the agriculture board's exhibition at the agriculture meeting in Gothenburg in 1923. Vice chairman of the JUF (Youth Agricultural Society) in Östergötland district from 1930-1939, member of the drainage committee in Östergötland County since 1945.

workExperience.title: Leader of household society's drainage operations
